brief_summary.textblock:
According to the BCLC guidelines, surgical resection of hepatocellular carcinoma
      complicating cirrhosis is restricted to patients with preserved liver function.

      However, the surgical indications for hepatocellular carcinoma  with portal hypertension
      remain controversial.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Portal Hypertension Before Liver Resection in Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patients with hepatocellular carcinoma who undergo surgical resection (intention to
             treat analysis)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  extra-hepatic disease

clinical_study.keyword: portal hypertension, cirrhosis, hepatocellular carcinoma, surgical treatment
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Portal Hypertension Before Liver Resection in Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma
